"It's a matter of survival, If Megatron succeeds in his plans then 
our reality wouldn't exist." Phobia didn't know exactly what Megatron 
was planning, he just knew that Megatron was a megalomaniacle tyrant 
so whatever it was wasn't good for any of them. He wasn't sure when 
he said our reality, the only reality that mattered to him was his. 
Even if these Predacons had to be sacrificed, even if a thousand 
Predacons needed to be sacrificed he would save himself.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>    Destructor walked out of his ship and walked up to Phobia."So 
why are you 
> so bent on destroying this bot?"
